meanings.definition: A card game for two or more players using a 48-card deck.
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we played a fun game of pinocle.
meanings.sent2: Every Friday night, the neighbors gather to play pinocle together.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to understand the rules of pinocle.
meanings.sent4: In the world of card games, pinocle shines brightly as a classic.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shuffling cards filled the room as they prepared to play pinocle.

meanings.definition: A meld of the queen of spades and jack of diamonds in the game of pinochle.
meanings.sent1: She won the round with a perfect pinocle of queen of spades and jack of diamonds.
meanings.sent2: The highest scoring move in pinochle is to achieve a pinocle.
meanings.sent3: His lucky charm seemed to be the perfect pinocle every time he played.
meanings.sent4: The pinocle of queen of spades and jack of diamonds symbolized victory.
meanings.sent5: The room erupted in cheers as she laid down her winning pinocle combination.
